_header: Sith Thou hast born the King of Grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, carols to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (aaab) with ‘O dulcis maria’ refrain and burden: ‘O clemens O pia / O dulcis maria’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Sith thou hast born the kyng of graceThe lorde the prynce of euery
                    place…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Wherof the Ioy schalle ay endureO dulcis
                    Maria
